designs.name: Luxury Premium Guest Room
designs.description: High-end guest room offering elegance, comfort, and premium hospitality experience
designs.flooring: Engineered wood flooring with plush area rug
designs.walls: Textured walls with upholstered headboard panel
designs.ceiling: Designer false ceiling with cove lighting
designs.furniture: King bed, lounge chair, work desk, wardrobe
designs.prompt_keywords: luxury hotel guest room, premium hospitality bedroom
